ing: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced fat cream cheese, softened
des: "This is a lower-fat adaptation I created from another recipe with an extra boost of flavor."
ins: In a bowl, mix together the cream cheese, smoked salmon, capers, caper juice, lemon juice, chives, and dill weed until well blended. Cover, and chill for 1 hour. Serve with buttery crackers.
